name: Triangle OS
description:
This is Triangle OS, An OS Made on Scratch

Triangle OS is an OS made on Scratch And becuase Scratch is very limiting, there is no internet access or proper updates. You will need to come back to this page when it is ready. Made by -MePix- (Me) and SadAvocadoStudios.

At 1.0 I will make it available for all types of computers

Want to help? Leave me an E-mail at: cloudcodes.internet@gmail.com
